extendedInfo.description: Created by Fins Media Group, the Fishinâ Guy application instantly delivers the most detailed fishing information through entertaining and educational video streams. The Travel Expert behind this APP is none other than one of the worldâs most well traveled anglers, Henry Waszczuk. Fishermen around the world can now access essential information from the palm of their hand. At the touch of a button, the Fishinâ Guy smartphone APP instantly delivers Fishing Hot Spots, Top Lodges and Resorts, Fishing Guides and Charterboats, as well as detailed information on more than 70 freshwater and saltwater fish that will help you become a more successful angler.

reviews.title: App sucks
reviews.comment: In order to view anything from the menu you must upgrade it has no good info in this app android needs to remove it.
reviews.author: Saul Olivares

reviews.title: Lots of problems
reviews.comment: Menu scroll does not work, does not fit to screen, errors with display, etc.
reviews.author: Danielle Glaze

reviews.title: Looks good but the menu not scrolling correctly
reviews.comment: Could be a good app but the menu doesn\'t work correctly when you go into the species of fish and you have to upgrade to premium to see any thing good
reviews.author: Richard Ray

reviews.comment: Does not optimize size  for tablet, menus don\'t work right and amount of info is limited.
reviews.author: Gary Fake

reviews.title: Suckkks
reviews.comment: I have to upgrade in order to get information which defeats the purpose
reviews.author: Markeal Williams

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: This app won\'t allow to move thru content. If you do see something of interest,  the app shuts down. Don\'t waste your time downloading this one...
reviews.author: Larry Baiamonte
